Class TaxonomyLoader

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.biology.taxonomy.TaxonomyLoader
public class TaxonomyLoader extends Object
Loads species taxonomy data from JSON resources. Consolidates functionality from former loaders package. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Constructor Details

    • TaxonomyLoader

      public TaxonomyLoader()

  • Method Details

    • loadAll

      public static List<Species> loadAll()
      Loads species from the default JSON resource. Ensures data is loaded only once per session unless clearCache is called.
      Returns:
      List of loaded species.

    • getSpecies

      public static Species getSpecies(String scientificName)
      Retrieves a species by its scientific name.
      Parameters:
      scientificName - e.g., "Escherichia coli"
      Returns:
      The Species object, or null if not found.

    • clearCache

      public static void clearCache()
      Clears the internal cache and resets loaded state.

    • loadFromResource

      public static List<Species> loadFromResource(String resourcePath)
      Loads species from a specific resource path.
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - Classpath to the JSON file.
      Returns:
      List of species found in the file.
